shippingAndDeliveryContract: Shipping and Delivery Contract • Alexander Shipping Company

contract.partyOne: First Party: Alexander Shipping Company, an Egyptian licensed company specialized in door-to-door shipping and delivery services, supporting and developing e-commerce through its digital platforms and professional team.
contract.partyTwo: Second Party: The client or company opening an account on the Alexander Shipping system and wishing to benefit from the shipping and delivery services provided by the first party.
contract.introduction: Whereas the First Party is specialized in shipping and delivery services and has the legal capabilities and licenses required to perform express transport operations, including receiving shipments from specified points and delivering them to final recipients according to the details in the shipment waybill; and whereas the Second Party wishes to use these services, both parties have agreed as follows:

sections.title: 1. Prices and Modification Policy
points: Shipping prices are determined in Egyptian pounds according to Alexander Shipping’s approved pricing policy.
Any special pricing or terms agreement between the parties is considered part of this contract.
Alexander reserves the right to review and update prices based on operational or economic changes, with a 7-day prior notice.
Exception: In case of official fuel price increases, price changes may apply immediately without prior notice.
If shipment targets are not met, the company reserves the right to revise the agreed prices.
Extra charges apply for oversized shipments or those shipped in large white plastic bags.
Prices apply per shipment fitting in one flyer. Multiple flyers must be combined in one sealed plastic bag with details labeled.

sections.title: 2. Compensation
points: Maximum compensation for damage or loss is 500 EGP per shipment.
Incidents must be reported immediately; no claim is accepted after the courier departs.
The company has 14 working days to investigate claims.
The sender bears full responsibility for proper packaging.
Liquid or fragile items are shipped entirely at sender’s risk.

sections.title: 3. Administrative and Financial Responsibilities
points: If the consignee refuses to pay shipping fees, the sender bears full cost.
If a shipment is returned, the sender bears 50% of the shipping fee.
The client must accurately enter shipment data into the system.
The client is responsible for any missing or incorrect data.
If Alexander is requested to enter shipment data, an additional 5 EGP per shipment applies.

sections.title: 4. Liability Exemption
points: Alexander is not responsible for product defects, content, or quality.
The client must comply with consumer protection laws.
Alexander is not liable for any taxes or customs penalties imposed on the client’s shipments.

sections.title: 5. Legal Disputes
points: Any dispute related to the execution or interpretation of this agreement shall be settled by the courts of Cairo.

sections.title: 6. General Provisions
points: Once a shipment is handed to Alexander, it falls under the company’s responsibility.
The client acknowledges that shipments are handled solely for delivery and collection purposes.

sections.title: 7. Delivery Schedule
points: Alexander ensures deliveries within working hours and designated courier routes.
The company does not guarantee special or off-hour delivery times.
Special requests must be pre-approved in writing and may incur extra fees.

sections.title: 8. Geographic Coverage
points: Services are limited to urban areas and main cities only.
Deliveries to remote areas are subject to approval and extra charges.
One delivery attempt is considered sufficient proof of service.

sections.title: 9. Collection and Financial Settlement
points: Settlement requests are made through the Alexander Shipping app.
Requests are accepted on Mondays and Thursdays until 9 PM.
Payments are processed on Saturdays and Tuesdays.
Late requests roll over to the next settlement cycle.

sections.title: 10. Pickup Requests
points: Pickup requests must be submitted before 12 PM for same-day service.
Pickups operate from Saturday to Thursday.
Requests with fewer than 5 shipments incur an additional pickup fee.
Unregistered pickup requests are not executed.
If the merchant delays delivery for over 10 minutes, the request is canceled.

address2: Cairo - Gisr El Suez - near Roxy traffic light
about.title: About Alexander Logistics
about.subtitle: Delivering excellence across borders since 1999
about.whoWeAre.title: Who We Are

whoWeAre.p1: Alexander Logistic is one of the leading logistics and shipping companies in Egypt, committed to connecting individuals and businesses across all governorates and cities nationwide. Since our establishment in 1999, we have grown from a small service provider into a trusted name in the local shipping sector thanks to our service quality and wide coverage.
whoWeAre.p2: We offer a comprehensive range of domestic shipping services, including ground transportation, storage solutions, and door-to-door delivery, in addition to shipment management and tracking to ensure timely delivery with the highest level of efficiency.
whoWeAre.p3: We rely on the latest technologies and a highly experienced team to deliver flexible and seamless logistics solutions tailored to meet the needs of customers across Egypt.

about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.text: Providing reliable, efficient, and innovative local logistics solutions that empower businesses to grow within the Egyptian market. We are committed to exceeding customer expectations through exceptional service and a strong dedication to quality.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.text: To become the most trusted logistics partner in Egypt, recognized for our innovation, sustainability, and commitment to delivering real value to our customers, employees, and communities. We envision a future where domestic trade flows smoothly across our network.
about.coreValues.title: Our Core Values
about.coreValues.efficiency.title: Efficiency
about.coreValues.efficiency.description: We optimize every route and process to ensure swift delivery times.
about.coreValues.reliability.title: Reliability
about.coreValues.reliability.description: Your cargo is our responsibility. We guarantee safe and secure transport.
about.coreValues.globalReach.title: Local Reach
about.coreValues.globalReach.description: With a network that spans all governorates of Egypt, we connect your business to every destination nationwide.
about.coreValues.excellence.title: Excellence
about.coreValues.excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in every shipment we handle.
about.whyChoose.title: Why Choose Alexander Logistics
about.whyChoose.advancedTechnology.title: Advanced Technology
about.whyChoose.advancedTechnology.descr: Real-time tracking and AI-powered route optimization to ensure your shipments across Egypt always arrive on time.
about.whyChoose.sustainablePractices.des: We are committed to reducing our environmental impact through optimized transport and more efficient local operations.
about.whyChoose.support24.title: 24/7 Customer Support
about.whyChoose.support24.description: Our support team is available around the clock to assist you and answer your inquiries at any time.
about.whyChoose.flexibleSolutions.title: Flexible Solutions
about.whyChoose.flexibleSolutions.descri: From small parcels to large freight, we provide flexible local shipping solutions that scale with your business needs within Egypt.
features.fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
features.fastDelivery.description: Express shipping services with guaranteed delivery times to meet your urgent logistics needs
features.realTimeTracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.realTimeTracking.description: Track your shipments in real-time with our advanced GPS tracking system and get instant updates
features.securePackaging.title: Secure Packaging
features.securePackaging.description: Professional packaging solutions ensuring your goods arrive safely and intact at their destination
features.support247.title: 24/7 Support
features.support247.description: Round-the-clock customer service available to assist you with all your shipping inquiries
